trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around October 11th 2011
Summary: huge football triangle shaped object slowly hovered over my head
divs: Sighting Detailslooking up at stars the other night and I only saw this object comming towards me because the stars disappeared behind it as it came towards me slowly .I could not make out what it was it was moving slowly and black. it was the same color as the sky exactly same shade as the night sky and went directly over me then I could tell it it was triangular in shape and it blended in with the night sky,huge,like a football feild hoverd over my head silently and kept going till I could not see it made my skin crawl had a odd feeling afterwards this thing was so big but not a single sound or light or wind it still freaks me out talking about it
